Key Match Events: The Mets defeated the Phillies in Game 4 of the NLDS, advancing to the NLCS for the first time since 2015.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos reflected on the loss, acknowledging the Mets' strong performance and the impact of Jose Iglesias.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series marked the Phillies' elimination in the NLDS after a strong performance by Nick Castellanos, who had seven hits in 17 at-bats with a batting average of.412.
